author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1450: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1450. Whenever we adopt a node from a deferred DOM we must ensure that the node and the entire tree beneath it has been fully materialized before transferring it to its new owner document.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1450: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1450. Whenever we adopt a node from a deferred DOM we must ensure that the node and the entire tree beneath it has been fully materialized before transferring it to its new owner document.
